title: How to file your taxes without selling your soul
description: TurboTax and H&R Block ask you to give up the ironclad secrecy of your tax return. Why? To help them make more money.

title: Another Israeli spy app has been sold to 10 countries, researchers say
description: Citizen Lab and Microsoft report the hacking tool QuaDream has been used against politicians and journalists, but they did not identify the victims.

title: Substack unveils the product that got it banned from Twitter
description: Whether it will become a real competitor to Twitter won’t be known for weeks.

title: Biden administration considers rules for A.I. systems like Chat GPT
description: As an A.I. arms race heats up in Silicon Valley, the Commerce Department is considering how to develop an auditing process, to ensure the tech is trustworthy.

title: Judge denies Elizabeth Holmes’s appeal to stay out of prison
description: A federal judge said the Theranos founder could not stay free while she appeals her convictions.

title: FBI says public phone chargers may put your data at risk: What to know
description: Although it's unclear how common "juice jacking" attacks are, security agencies' repeated warnings indicate a persistent danger, experts say.

title: 'Claudia’ offers nude photos for pay. Experts say she’s an AI fake.
description: New technology has for years been pioneered through porn. AI-image creation hasn't broken from that pattern.

title: Quiz: Do your social media habits need a reset?
description: Here are eight questions to help you assess whether your social media habits are building you up or tearing you down.

title: Technology’s role in the ‘loneliness epidemic’
description: The Washington Post asked people of all ages to share their experiences with loneliness and the role technology has played. From high-schoolers to new moms to people in assisted-living facilities, we’re examining how people find and keep their friends. Are tech companies helping the lonely or taking advantage of them? Join us as we tell their stories.

title: They left social media for good. Are they happier?
description: Meet the social media unpluggers and why they decided to quit.
